name: Shivers
description:
Shivers is an adventure game developed by Sierra and Sierra On-Line. It came out on 31-12-1994. Sierra On-Line published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Shivers on PC. The game is sold via GOG.
It was produced by Wendy Albee. It was scored by Guy Whitmore.
